snippet.title: OTXO - PS4, PS5 & Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The smash-indie hit, OTXO, is coming to PS4, PS5 & Nintendo Switch on March 28th 2024! Enter an inexplicable, abstract mansion to rescue a loved one in this fast-paced, brutal, and dark roguelite filled with precise but savage gunplay and time-bending slow motion. Face your inner demons and unveil the secrets of the Mansion.

Find out more here: https://superraregames.com/pages/otxo
